articles.author: Csongor Körömi
articles.title: Danish PM condemns Trump team over imminent Greenland visit - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Mette Frederiksen vows to “stand against” aggressive overtures from the White House toward Arctic island.
articles.content: Frederiksen’s condemnation marks her most trenchant criticism of the White House since Trump turned his attention to seizing the self-ruling Danish territory, with its vast reserves of critical miner… [+1155 chars]
